name: bamboohr-mcp
description: Unofficial open source integration - Connect BambooHR to Claude Desktop for HR data access and workforce analytics
long_description: A comprehensive unofficial MCP server that provides Claude Desktop with read-only access to essential HR data from BambooHR. Features 8 powerful tools for employee lookup, time-off tracking, team management, workforce analytics, and custom reporting. Designed for HR professionals, managers, and teams who want to streamline HR workflows through AI-assisted queries.

api_key.title: BambooHR API Key
api_key.description: Your BambooHR API key (get from BambooHR → User Menu → API Keys)

subdomain.title: Company Subdomain
subdomain.description: Your company's BambooHR subdomain (e.g., 'mycompany' from mycompany.bamboohr.com)

prompts.name: find_employee_details
prompts.description: Find Employee Details - Quickly look up an employee by their name or email
prompts.text:
Find the employee matching: ${arguments.employee_query}

Please provide their full name, job title, department, and contact information using the bamboo_find_employee tool.

prompts.name: get_team_roster
prompts.description: Get Team Roster - List all employees in a specific department
prompts.text:
Show me the team roster for the ${arguments.department_name} department. 

Please list all team members with their job titles using the bamboo_team_info tool.

prompts.name: whos_out_this_week
prompts.description: Who's Out This Week - See a list of all employees on leave this week
prompts.text:
Who is out on leave this week?

Please use the bamboo_whos_out tool to get the list of employees on leave for the next 7 days.

prompts.name: show_headcount_by_department
prompts.description: Show Headcount by Department - Get a summary of employee headcount per department
prompts.text:
Show me the current employee headcount for each department.

Use the bamboo_workforce_analytics tool to get this data. The query should use the 'employee' dataset, count 'employeeNumber', and group by the 'department' field.

prompts.name: list_available_hr_reports
prompts.description: List Available HR Reports - See all custom reports available to run
prompts.text:
What custom HR reports are available?

Please use the bamboo_run_custom_report tool with the `list_reports` option set to true to see all available reports.

prompts.name: show_employee_photo
prompts.description: Show Employee Photo - Display the profile picture for a specific employee
prompts.text:
Show me the photo for ${arguments.employee_name}.

First, find the employee's ID using bamboo_find_employee, then get their photo URL using bamboo_get_employee_photo.

prompts.name: list_all_departments
prompts.description: List All Departments - Get a list of all available departments in the company
prompts.text:
What are all the departments in the company?

Please use the bamboo_list_departments tool to get a complete list.

tools.name: bamboo_workforce_analytics
